title: How does MMR Reset work
body:
Haven't finished my placement, 6 games in, cbf, how is it gonna reset for season 7? Does it act like it's a brand new account because it's still unranked? or does it take the current MMR of the placements and go off there? If someone from Riot could answer this, that be great

Ty

replies.body:
How other seasons have worked: You get a MINOR reset to the average MMR. If you are lower, your MMR gets a little better, if you are higher your MMR gets a little lower.

Your MMR of the previous season is like 90% the deciding factor of where you place next season more so than the result of your next seasons promos.

For example. An unranked new account that goes 10-0, might get Gold 1 or so. An account that was Silver 3 which is roughly where an unranked account starts, can go 10-0 in placements, and might only get Silver 1.

Real world example, i finished last season Plat 5 (but had like Gold 2-3 MMR). I went 7-3 in my placements and got placed in Silver 1.

HOWEVER with the "shambles" that was dynamic que, there are people calling for a Full MMR reset next season for at least the Solo/Duo que, so until Riot state what will happen, we don't 100% know yet.
